content: zico is a cardigan with a warm fluffy squishy feel and casual style the combination of cabled stitches with lace gives this sweater lots of texture without adding lots of weight with a deep v-neck generous ease and simple dropped shoulders zico is the perfect cardigan to cozy up in especially in a vibrant rich color size xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x shown in size l with 10 inches/25 cm of ease finished measurements body circumference 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 66 70 inches/96 5 107 117 127 137 5 147 5 157 5 168 178 cm length at center back 21 5 22 22 25 22 5 22 75 23 23 23 5 23 5 inches/54 5 56 56 5 57 58 58 5 58 5 59 5 59 5 cm materials miss babs killington 85% polwarth wool 15% tussah silk 350 yd/320m per 4 2 oz/120 g skein color sweet gum 4 4 5 5 5 6 6 6 7 skeins needles us 7/4 5mm 36 inches/90cm or longer for main body us 7/4 5mm 16 inches/40cm or preferred method for knitting sleeves in the round us 5/3 75mm 36 inches/90cm or longer for ribbing and button band us 5/3 75mm double pointed needles for sleeve cuffs notions buttons five 1 inch/25mm diameter buttons cable needle optional stitch markers including 2 unique tapestry needle waste yarn or spare needles to hold sts gauge 22 sts/32 row = 4 inches/10 cm in pattern st pattern notes construction this sweater is knit flat in one piece from the bottom up to the armholes after v-neck and shoulder shaping is complete sleeves are picked up and knit from the top down to the cuffs finally a button band is added to the front if you wish to adjust the overall length of your cardigan you may do so before you begin the v-neck shaping
